How to add the robot‚Äôs CAD to AdvantageScope? I‚Äôve already checked all the documentation and couldn‚Äôt get it to work. The CAD is already in .glb format, I‚Äôve created the necessary folder and the configuration file, but my robot doesn‚Äôt appear‚Äîonly the KitBots do.

Do I need any specific code, or is there anything else I need to do besides following the video from team 6328? Please help me!

Are you trying to use articulated components? The config file that you shared declares three components, but you haven‚Äôt provided model files for them. If you aren‚Äôt trying to use components, you should set the components key in the config file to an empty array. If you are trying to use components, I would highly recommend exploring AdvantageScope‚Äôs support for 2D mechanisms on the 3D field instead.
